title: Scent of Double Deception
description: Two women, two identities, one lie.An innocent charade catapults Clair Matthews and Kelley Malone into mystery and deception.Rugged cattleman Joe Paul Farrell falls victim to Kelley's elusive charms. Russell Gibson, loyal private investigator, enters a dangerous liaison. Bodyguard Spencer Walker desires the woman he cannot possess.An ocean away, ruthless Linford Thurlow sets in motion a decades-old plan.Six peoples' lives interlace through conflict and romance, but whom, if any, will succumb to a murderous plot of betrayal?
author: Jeannie Faulkner Barber
